description: Light the World provides inspirational examples of Jesus Christ's attributes and ways we can follow in His footsteps to provide light to the world during the Christmas holiday season.  Simply ask Alexa to "Light the World today" and get your daily message for December leading up to Christmas Day (valid from Dec 01-25)
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Light the World what the message is for tomorrow
Alexa, ask Light the World to tell me the message for December 15
name: Light the World
shortDescription: Displays inspirational ideas on how we can follow Jesus Christ's examples to light the world.
